line_1: When youthfu' lovers first were pair'd,
line_2: Lang syne in EDEN'S bonie yard,

line_1: When youthfu' lovers first were pair'd,
line_2: An' all the Soul of Love they shar'd,

line_1: When youthfu' lovers first were pair'd,
line_2: Sweet on the fragrant, flow'ry swaird,

line_1: Blest be that social pow'r, the first who pair'd
line_2: The erring footman with th' unerring card.
